AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States: country where defendants were indicted for transporting undocumented aliens
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Court: legal body presiding over the case involving defendants Ricardo Rodriguez, Jr. and Ignacio Rodriguez, Jr.
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Freer Police Department: law enforcement agency involved in the traffic stop of Defendant Ignacio Rodriguez, Jr.
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Freer, Texas: location of immigration checkpoint on U.S. 59
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.U.S. 59: highway where Freer immigration checkpoint is located
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Freer immigration checkpoint: location of border patrol activity where Agent Jorge Luis Trevino was stationed, with drop-offs occurring on nearby FM 2050 to avoid checkpoints
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Corpus: possible destination for vehicles inspected at the Freer immigration checkpoint
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Houston: destination city for smuggled aliens, accessible via Highway 16
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Farm-to-Market Road 2050: road where drop-offs of undocumented aliens occur to avoid checkpoints, intersecting with U.S. 59 and U.S. 359
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Freer immigration checkpoint building: building where border patrol agents process undocumented individuals
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Border Patrol station parking lot: parking area near the Freer immigration checkpoint
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Freer immigration checkpoint office: office where border patrol agents inspect vehicles and process individuals
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Bruni: reference point for drop-offs of undocumented aliens, located between the Freer checkpoint and the drop-off points on FM 2050
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Hebbronville: location of a checkpoint on U.S. 359, which smugglers try to avoid by taking alternative routes like the loop
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Highway 16: route where smuggled aliens are picked up after being dropped off near FM 2050 and then transported to destinations like Houston or San Antonio
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.San Antonio: destination city for smuggled aliens, accessible via Highway 16
